entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bachelors Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness early in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 30. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 33. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 23. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 21. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 22. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 30 January 2023
